__TOC__

Launchpad is a collection of services that assist in software development.  Ubuntu uses it to manage its specifications, bugs, and other assorted things.  LaunchpadHowTo describes how we do so.

LaunchpadStepByStepInstructions outlines in a simple manner how to get your code up and running in Launchpad.
